pageContext.description: Edges damaged. The piece was bent in breaking. Central rib is defined by two deeply sunk lines.
pageContext.patina: With remains of patina dark green.
pageContext.associations: A hoard containing at least 53 articles in 63 fragments, mostly swords, spearheads, ferrules, & rings.
pageContext.publications: White, Gilbert, Nat. Hist. of Selborne, 1876, 254-8,White, Gilbert, Nat. Hist. of Selborne, Ed. Bell 1877, 381,Evans, B. Imps, 464
pageContext.site: England,Hampshire,Selborne,In garden of a cottage on the western side of the road, ascending from Eveley corner to Hogmoor.,Spring 1870
